title: PSA: Don't fucking queue up if your tilted
body: Seriously. I just played with an ekko that was tilted from the fucking champ select and cost us the game.

replies.body: You seem tilted. I hope you didn't jump straight into another game.
he better not have!

> [{quoted}](name=DarkRitual,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6K2RG49j,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2016-10-24T16:46:55.397+0000)
>
> You seem tilted. I hope you didn't jump straight into another game.

I don't stop until I win, but rather than blame others I always look for things I actually have control over. Everybody deals with their anger differently.
You´re*
I am now tilted.
How do you know
better not queue up then
I know I shouldn't but sometimes I do anyway -_-

i had a zed yesterday who was a ticking fucking time bomb. every 6 minutes he would screw up something easy and get emo as shit like "sorry guys..im distracted, really sad lately." or "why did i sorc boots?...sorry...im really down"


i told my duo in discord "if this fucking guy says his gf broke up with him im afking"
Lmao that happened to me before. In a ranked game our jungler said his gf broke up with him. Wtf

im just like dude, play the game stop tryna dump out your purse on strangers, no one is taking your sympathy bait.

walk away with a bit of dignity.
tilt post with cringe
how is it possible to get tilted from champ select without trolls on your team?
I would assume they were tilted from a previous game.

Here's one way:
1. Queue up, get secondary role
2. Next game, queue up, get Primary role, someone dodges, queue, get secondary role
3. Next game, queue up, get Primary role, REMAKE, queue, get secondary role
4. Next game, queue up, get Primary role, someone dodges, queue, get secondary role

By this point, I got tilted when I got put in my secondary AGAIN, especially when at least 3/4 (if not all 4) the person playing my primary sucked/fed each time.  I had to step away for a while to recalibrate.  But in my "defense" I was basically tilted by being put IN secondary role so I wasn't fully tilted UNTIL I was already in champ select.
oh, i think im just way too apathetic for that

I have to keep playing I don't have enough time to get to gold unless I play non-stop.

Still eventually it becomes too much and I have to take a break so I don't consider killing myself.

I have a deck of cards next to me to shuffle to try to detilt
That's a good untilt technique!
https://m.youtube.com/watch?v=hTBGrFW0a9E
Tilted isn't a thing. Shitty players are shitty, not tilted.

I was registered for a tournament and as to warm up I duo'd with my friend who tilted me and caused me to lose on the first game. (He trolled -.-) although it wasn't only my fault, our support had no communication and went in 24/7 (Leona life) and out jg followed up every single time (even in 2v5'S)

(He trolled -.-) although it wasn't only my fault, our support had no communication and went in 24/7 (Leona life) and out jg followed up every single time (even in 2v5'S)

Did you remove thou art knave friend? You can't leave us hanging with not knowing the aftermath.

> [{quoted}](name=Hunstoppable,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=6K2RG49j,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2016-10-24T21:39:18.727+0000)
>

Say that a bit more clearly please
I usually have a system with playing ranked. If I set out to play 5 games, a max of 2 losses in a row is where I draw it because a win can easily relax you if you lost your previous game.
Also don't fucking troll in ranked if your pickban main is bannedpicked.

dont que up if you are gonna afk for 15 min
dont que up if you are gonna afk after 7 min for the rest of the game.

im much more concerned with people feeding the enemy kills and then leave.
I fairly regularly play norms when rank has tilted me in order to destress. Do you hate me now? :(
we all know. But when we actually get tilted we lose the ability to make the proper decision of not queuing up.
How are you supposed to get untilted then????
I do that all the time, its fun fuken over other peoples days too
